overview:
Daange Founder and CEO.

Entrepreneur for digital businesses and startups.

Project Management, Agility and Application Lifecycle Management specialist. Experience in consulting, development and management of technology solutions and services. Works as a consultant providing services in a global scale to the world’s largest organizations, in charge of the Stefanini SharePoint Excellence Center.

Solid knowledge in project management tools and frameworks PMBOK, Scrum, XP, Kanban, among others. Postgraduate degree in Strategic Project Management.

PMP certified (Project Management Professional) and PMI-ACP certified (Agile Certified Practitioner) by PMI (Project Management Institute), including many others certifications on technical and management field.

One of the first professionals in the world to obtain the PMI-ACP certification.

President and founder of Scrum Minas, the first and only Scrum Alliance’s official user group in Minas Gerais, and one of the first in Brazil. www.scrumminas.com.br

Also works as a Executive to the Project Management Institute (PMI Minas Gerais Chapter), as a program manager for the chapter’s administration program.

Speaker at technology and project management events.
